entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 12:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over mountainous terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries at times heavy near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over mountainous terrain. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
